mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Letter from Teddi Leiden to Aldo Colautti

mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: A letter from Teddi Leiden, president of PARC, to Aldo Colautti, secretary of the Department of Public Welfare, requesting copies of Dr. Jay Reznik's review of dental services at state schools and hospitals.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records

4. State Schools and Hospitals (SSH) and Interim Care Facilities 1972-1984
